shop.name: Out of frame
shop.description: Its a private studio in a very calm and quiet neighborhood. I run the studio on my own but have danish tattoo artists as guests from week to week. Its by appointment only as the location is not really for walk ins.

shop.name: Cast of Crowns Art Collective
shop.description: Cast of Crowns Art Collective is to be celebrated as a sanctuary for artist that co-exist in both Fine Art oil painting and the ancient art of Tattoo. We genuinely love our home and the incredible opportunities it has offered us here in beautiful Laguna Beach. Each tattoo artist specializes in a certain genre in quest to master their craft. We also host Desi Arellano, a world renowned Body Piercer, and an active member of the APP. Our gallery exhibits paintings by our resident artists, as well as the work of up-and-coming artists from Laguna College of Art and Design. Our gallery is completely open to the public, seven days a week. As proud members of First Thursdays Art Walk, we hold a formal reception with new works every month, as well as live music, wine, and hors d‚Äôoeuvres to enhance your viewing experience. Our world-class tattoo and piercing artists operate to the highest standards, and are always available for consultation.
